mapper.insert: insert into user_card_relation (user_card_id, user_id, card_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{userCardId}, #{userId}, #{cardId}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select user_card_id, user_id, card_id, create_time, update_time from user_card_relation
